<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// getToken - This function extracts one token from source, ignoring any</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// leading characters that appear in the Delimiters string, and ending the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// token at any of the characters that appear in the Delimiters string.  If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// there are no tokens in the source string, an empty string is returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The function returns a pair containing the extracted token and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// remaining tail string.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a20237283e8b9e354abec8dc5ab16bd16"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;StringRef, StringRef&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a20237283e8b9e354abec8dc5ab16bd16">llvm::getToken</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Source,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Delimiters) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Figure out where the token starts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the next occurrence of the delimiter.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a54e59e2d53e5ee736ee060be7c457508">StringRef::size&#95;type</a> End = Source.find&#95;first&#95;of(Delimiters, Start);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(Source.slice(Start, End), Source.substr(End));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a694be13ec7a118397b5d1a4325d052e5"><Highlight kind="normal">std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a694be13ec7a118397b5d1a4325d052e5">llvm::convertToSnakeFromCamelCase</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> input) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string snakeCase;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  snakeCase.reserve(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> check = &#91;&amp;input&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;bool(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)&gt; predicate) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j &lt; input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() &amp;&amp; predicate(input&#91;j&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>(); ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    snakeCase.push&#95;back(tolower(input&#91;i&#93;));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handles &quot;runs&quot; of capitals, such as in OPName -&gt; op&#95;name.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (check(i, isupper) &amp;&amp; check(i + 1, isupper) &amp;&amp; check(i + 2, islower))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">      snakeCase.push&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;&#95;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((check(i, islower) || check(i, isdigit)) &amp;&amp; check(i + 1, isupper))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      snakeCase.push&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;&#95;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> snakeCase;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba9c7a61ab2767e77f9ada22f54441c0"><Highlight kind="normal">std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba9c7a61ab2767e77f9ada22f54441c0">llvm::convertToCamelFromSnakeCase</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> input,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> capitalizeFirst) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string output;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  output.reserve(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Push the first character, capatilizing if necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (capitalizeFirst &amp;&amp; std::islower(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a61364ca3a5ff90fb2aa0d5a371fd43f7">front</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    output.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadcb10384f6f67a800d81e4312cabc46">llvm::toUpper</a>(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a61364ca3a5ff90fb2aa0d5a371fd43f7">front</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    output.push&#95;back(input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a61364ca3a5ff90fb2aa0d5a371fd43f7">front</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk the input converting any &#96;&#42;&#95;&#91;a-z&#93;&#96; snake case into &#96;&#42;&#91;A-Z&#93;&#96; camelCase.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> pos = 1, e = input.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>(); pos &lt; e; ++pos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (input&#91;pos&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;&#95;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; pos != (e - 1) &amp;&amp; std::islower(input&#91;pos + 1&#93;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      output.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadcb10384f6f67a800d81e4312cabc46">llvm::toUpper</a>(input&#91;++pos&#93;));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      output.push&#95;back(input&#91;pos&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> output;</Highlight></CodeLine>
